skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have considerable experience working on Front-End design through my personal projects. Although these projects were not completed in a professional environment, I believe Front-End design is one of my strong suits.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I am quite proficient in Back-End development, which complements my skills as a FullStack developer. I have a solid understanding of the basics of Back-End development. In my personal projects, I have implemented complex logic and code, further enhancing my proficiency.

skills.title: UI & UX design
skills.description: I am very interested in UI & UX design and have dedicated many personal hours to researching and becoming knowledgeable in this field. I believe my designs are modern and well-structured, and my user experience work has received positive feedback, with no complaints so far.
